title: Canada is spending millions on faster testing tech for COVID-19. How could it impact the backlog? - The Globe and Mail
description: Spartan Bioscience’s new rapid coronavirus test can provide results in about 30 minutes, ideal for smaller, more remote areas
content:
A healthcare worker swabs a patient at a drive-through clinic in Montreal on March 31, 2020. 
Paul Chiasson/The Canadian Press
